judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: The prosecution is able to establish the charge against the accused under section 342 511 IPC beyond all reasonable doubt. So, he is found guilty under said section and convicted accordingly. The prosecution has failed to establish the charge against the accused under section 4 18 of POCSO Act beyond all reasonable doubt. So, he is acquitted of the charge under said section on benefit of doubt. The accused convict is sentence to under go simple imprisonment for 122 days and the period underwent during investigation and trail shall be set off as per law.
